channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Magento 1& 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Magento 1& 2

item.title: CVE-2019-8123|2024-08-04T21:10:32.855Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- magento%201%26%202
item.description: An insufficient logging and monitoring vulnerability exists in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.19, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3. The logging feature required for effective monitoring did not contain sufficent data to effectively track configuration changes.
